english.segment1: Love is not proud. Love does not boast. Love after all. Matters the most
english.segment2: Love does not run. Love does not hide. Love does not keep. Locked inside
english.segment3: Love is the river that flows through. Love never fails you
english.segment4: Love will sustain. Love will provide. Love will not cease. At the end of time
english.segment5: Love will protect. Love always hopes. Love still believes. When you dont
english.segment6: Love is the arms that are holding you. Love never fails you
english.segment7: When my heart wont make a sound. When I cant turn back around. When the sky is falling down. Nothing is greater than this. Greater than this
english.segment8: Love is right here. Love is alive. Love is the way. The truth the life
english.segment9: Love is the river than flows through. Love is the arms that are holding you. Love is the place you will fly to. Love never fails you
